__comment2: Getting exceptions after changing the json file? Make sure you have valid json here: http://jsonlint.com/

defaultBookmarks.title: German musicians born in Berlin
defaultBookmarks.query:
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
SELECT ?name ?birth ?description ?person WHERE {
     ?person dbo:birthPlace :Berlin .
     ?person <http://purl.org/dc/terms/subject> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Category:German_musicians> .
     ?person dbo:birthDate ?birth .
     ?person foaf:name ?name .
     ?person rdfs:comment ?description .
     FILTER (LANG(?description) = 'en') .
}
ORDER BY ?name
